# mutableAudioBufferList

**Instance Property**

A mutable version of the buffer’s underlying audio buffer list.

## Declaration

```swift
var mutableAudioBufferList: UnsafeMutablePointer<AudioBufferList> { get }
```

## Discussion

You use this with some lower-level Core Audio and Audio Toolbox APIs that require a mutable [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreAudioTypes/AudioBufferList] (for example, the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioConverterConvertComplexBuffer(_:_:_:_:)] function).

The `mDataByteSize` fields of this audio buffer list express the buffer’s current [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioPCMBuffer/frameCapacity]. If you alter the capacity, modify the buffer’s `frameLength` to match.

## Getting the Audio Buffers

- **audioBufferList**: The buffer’s underlying audio buffer list.
